########## RESOURCES & CODES START HERE ##########
USE THESE CODES AT YOUR OWN RISK!, I am not responsible if any of these codes break your save, as a good practice I always make a backup of my save beforehand every time I apply a cheat.
 
########## DISCLAIMER ##########
The work put into the creation of these codes & resources come from some of the following Discord Servers: 
Discord Server List: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources

VVVVVVVV VVVVVVVV

AM Search String: VulnerabilityEffectBonusMetaUpgradeN

Notes: 
VV's = Value in Double Float (Little Endian)
https://www.binaryconvert.com/convert_double.html
to convert to double float, use windows programers calculator to flip the bits
or use this python3 script here: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/Scripts/pyconvert.py
Usage: python3 pyconvert.py 999 -df -ltl

if thats to hard use the inspector window in a hex editor & type in the double float field, make sure the workflow is set in little endian.

VV (Anything higher then 200,000 can cause issues)
100 | 0000000000005940
500 | 0000000000407F40
999 | 0000000000388F40
1000 | 0000000000408F40
9999 | 000000008087C340
10000 | 000000000088C340
50000 | 00000000006AE840
99999 | 00000000F069F840
999999 | 000000007E842E41
100000 | 00000000006AF840
200000 | 00000000006A0841
9999999 | 000000E0CF126341
99999999 | 000000FC83D79741
999999999 | 000080FF64CDCD41


 
[Zeraf3000#8256]

APPLY THESE TO THE PROFILE x.SAV (not the temp file)                    
Max Thick Skin (Super Health)                    
80010014 530C0000                    
004D6574 61557067                    
72616465 73540000                    
88010012 4865616C                 
74684D65 74615570                
67726164 654E0000                
A8000012 00000008                
00000000 F8690841                
                    
Max Chtonic Vitality (Super Health Regen after each area)                    
80010014 530C0000                    
004D6574 61557067                    
72616465 73540000                    
88010014 446F6F72                 
4865616C 4D657461                 
55706772 6164654E                
A8000014 00000008                
00000000 F8690841                
                    
Max FieryPresence (Super Max damage when enemies are at max health)                    
80010014 530C0000                    
004D6574 61557067                    
72616465 73540000                    
88010017 46697273                
74537472 696B654D                
65746155 70677261                
64654E00 00000000                
A8000017 00000008                
00000000 00408F40                
                    
Max Greater Reflex (Infinite dash)                    
80010014 530C0000                    
004D6574 61557067                    
72616465 73540000                    
88010013 5374616D                 
696E614D 65746155                
70677261 64654E00                
A8000013 00000008                
00000000 F8690841                
                    
                    
Max Stygian Soul (Unlimited Ranged attck)                    
80010014 530C0000                    
004D6574 61557067                    
72616465 73540000                    
88010016 52656C6F                
6164416D 6D6F4D65                
74615570 67726164                
654E0000 00000000                
A8000016 00000008                
00000000 F8690841

Zeraf3000's Notes:
These codes will make you permanently OP, which means you probably will be able to finish the game in 1 try.
Make sure you have everything unlocked and everything done in the Temple of Styx (if you're a completionist) before using them.
ALSO, in order to use these, the respective skill has to be already UNLOCKED in the mirror in your room and preferably maxed out. Which means you have to be in the temple when applying them

[Skiller#4741]
Mirror Upgrades (MetaUpgrades)
80010014 530C0000
004D6574 61557067
72616465 73540000

880100XX VVVVVVVV

A80000XX 00000008
VVVVVVVV VVVVVVVV

### START ###
SuperGiftPoints (Ambrosia)
80010010 09000000 
5265736F 75726365 
73540000 00000000
88010014 0F000000
53757065 72476966
74506F69 6E74734E
A8000014 00000008
VVVVVVVV VVVVVVVV

LockKeys (Keys)
80010010 09000000 
5265736F 75726365 
73540000 00000000
8801000D 08000000
4C6F636B 4B657973
4E000000 00000000
A800000D 00000008
VVVVVVVV VVVVVVVV

Breakdown notes by Skiller
= Searching For Resource Ascii Line (Does not change)
80010010 09000000 
5265736F 75726365 
73540000 00000000

= LockKey Ascii section (Changes based on Item)
8801000D 08000000
4C6F636B 4B657973
4E000000 00000000

+ Value to be added to this time (only the Offset changes 0D will match the Size used on 880100XX)
A800000D 00000008  
VVVVVVVV VVVVVVVV

Really you only need to change the A800000D and the full (88) Ascii section search to build any resource code
### END ###

# Resources Notes, AM, Spreadsheets etc... #
Hades Save Editor: https://github.com/zsennenga/hades_save_editor
QC Google Doc: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pln64WRA8QhhrW1QBDEn97HEbp4gdvBNd3GnrC4Bg5c/edit#gid=1346651583

# Misc Skillers Notes #
0x54 = Group (Amount in Group Right After Example in pic 07)
0x53 = Ascii Size then Name 
0x4E = Double Float
https://i.imgur.com/s2Lldxm.png

# Misc AM Reference #
Fiery Presence (Bonus damage when striking enemies that have full health)= FirstStrikeMetaUpgrade                                   
CHTONIC Vitality  (Restores health after exiting a chamber)= DoorHealMetaUpgrade                                 
Greater Reflex (Increases times you can chain dash)= StaminaMetaUpgrade                                   
Stygian Soul (Regenerates ranged atack)= ReloadAmmoMetaUpgrade                               
Thick Skin (Increases max health)= HealthMetaUpgrade

ExtraChanceMetaUpgrade = Death Defiance
RerollMetaUpgrade = Fated Authority
DuoRarityBoonDropMetaUpgrade = Gods' Legacy
RareBoonDropMetaUpgrade = Olympian Favor
DoorHealthMetaUpgrade = Chthonic Vitality

SuperGiftPoints = Ambrosia
SuperGems = Diamonds
MetaPoints = Darkness
GiftPoints = Nectar
Gems = Gemstones
LockKeys = Keys
SuperLockKeys = Titan Blood

Game Uses 64bit Double Float for most values.
